content: **yarn requirements ** acrylic 4 ply knitting worsted weight * 1 oz white * 1/2 oz pale yellow * 1/2 oz bright yellow * 1/2 oz orange * a few yards each purple blue green red and black **additional materials required ** * fiberfill * 7 - 8 inch 17 8 - 20 3 cm plastic lid or other material to insert in rainbow direct pdf link http //botherthebirds net/wp-content/uploads/2012/12/rainbow pdf 1 1 http //botherthebirds net/wp-content/uploads/2012/12/rainbow pdf
